dialogue.text: You are looking a lot less...twitchy today.
Yeah, that herbal tea you gave me is keeping my heartbeat from being defening.
This is quite the crowd today...
You realize that you have some...
Shady looking individuals here today right? I mean, tell me the guy with the swords isn't out here for blood!
I mean, tell me the guy with the swords isn't out here for blood!
OH! You mean the taiko drummer with the sick dragon tattoo?
Don't worry, this guy is super chill.
He's been through a lot, you could even learn a thing or two from him!
You are making it sound like thats who you want me to meet....
This is my friend I was telling you about.
You know, the one trying to start a band!
